TextView.android:text:
WHAT IS VENTILATION APP? It’s an app that allows the doctor to simulate interaction with a lung ventilator. HOW DOES IT WORK? You need to set the parameters of the patient, scrolling the menu and filling the spaces. 
Then do the same thing for the ventilator’s parameters. 
The simulation will show you 2 graphs: volume and flow, taken during both expiratory and inspiratory phases. 
A traffic light will display if you are doing correctly. RED LIGHT= You have to change parameters 
YELLOW LIGHT= You are near to the right solution 
GREEN LIGHT= You are right! You are near the OPTIMUM
